adyen_abstract.label: Adyen Default Settings
adyen_abstract.comment: Click the following link for an instructional video on how to set up the Adyen Magento plugin, or here to download an integration guide or here to sign up for a test account. The latest version of the Adyen Magento plugin is also available through GitHub. If you have any further questions, please visit the Adyen.com website or email magento@adyen.com.

merchantAccount.label: Merchant Account
merchantAccount.comment: You can find this in the Adyen backoffice.

demoMode.label: Test/Production Mode
demoMode.comment: In test mode you must use test cards. You can find them here

order_status.label: New order status
order_status.comment: Select only status assigned to state new

payment_authorized.label: Order status authorised payment
payment_authorized.comment: (optional)Select only status assigned to state processing.Leave empty if you are not sure

payment_pre_authorized.label: Order status pre-authorised payment
payment_pre_authorized.comment: (optional)Only affecting manual work flow.Leave empty if you are not sure

payment_cancelled.label: Order status cancelled payment
payment_cancelled.comment: Action to be attempted incase of failed notifications from Adyen.Notice orders with invoices can not be cancelled, will just get status change.

refund_authorized.label: Refund authorise (refund success)
refund_authorized.comment: (optional) leave empty if you are not sure

notification_username.label: Notification Username
notification_username.comment: Should match your "notifications settings" in your Adyen account.

notification_password.label: Notification Password
notification_password.comment: Should match your "notifications settings" in your Adyen account.

capture_mode.label: Capture Mode
capture_mode.comment: If you are using "The manual capture in Adyen" set this to manual and you will get a chance to capture it by creating the invoice and select "capture online".If not sure select auto.Notice:Ideal and Cash are always Auto Capture!

ws_password_test.label: Adyen ws password for Test
ws_password_test.comment: The password of the ws user for Test

ws_password_live.label: Adyen ws password for Live
ws_password_live.comment: The password of the ws user for Live

shopperlocale.label: Language locale (optional)
shopperlocale.comment: Leave empty to let Magento decide (Ex: nl_NL)

countryCode.label: Country Code ISO (optional)
countryCode.comment: Leave empty to let Adyen decide on IP-address (Ex: NL)

skinCode.label: Skin Code
skinCode.comment: The skin code you want to use (You can find this in the admin are of your Adyen account)

secret_wordt.label: HMAC Key for Test
secret_wordt.comment: Should match with the HMAC test key in the Adyen backoffice.

secret_wordp.label: HMAC Key for Live
secret_wordp.comment: Should match with the HMAC live key in the Adyen backoffice.

payment_routines.label: Payment Flow Selection
payment_routines.comment: Adyen provide you with 2 types of payment routines. Multi-page and Single Page

delivery_days.label: Days for Delivery
delivery_days.comment: How many days to be added to the current date for delivery. ONLY numbers allowed.

disable_hpptypes.label: Leave payment method selection on HPP
disable_hpptypes.comment: If you say yes here, payment methods in the checkout won't be displayed and you will be redirected to the Adyen HPP to make the selection.

cache_directory_lookup.label: Cache payment method call
cache_directory_lookup.comment: Enable this if you having trouble with performance and you don't have any amount rules setup in your skin in the Adyen backoffice.

return_url_in_request.label: Return url in request
return_url_in_request.comment: If you have a multi webshop and you want to use one skin only, enable this option

recurringtypes.label: Recurring Type
recurringtypes.comment: You can set different value for POS because you have to have the permission of the customer

enable_scanner.label: Enable Scanner
enable_scanner.comment: If you enable this you have the possiblity to scan products with a hand scanner on the shopping cart page and this will automatically add products to the shopping cart based on the same SKU name

express_checkout.label: Express checkout
express_checkout.comment: This will show a checkout buttton on the shopping cart to directly do a POS payment without going to the checkout steps. You must be loged into your account

enable_moto.label: Enable MOTO for backend orders
enable_moto.comment: Important you have to activate MOTO for your acocunt contact magento@adyen.com. For more information check our MOTO manual

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: One Click payments only work if you have Adyen CC enabled

delivery_days.label: Days for Delivery
delivery_days.comment: How many days to be added to the current date for delivery. ONLY numbers allowed.

validate_iban.label: Validate Iban
validate_iban.comment: This is a basic validation on the Iban number.
